title: Lunar
description: Lily White has new neighbours. New neighbours who like to stare at her. The night after their arrival, a chilling howl fills the air and by morning, mutilated bodies have made an appearance on the news. After she finds her life intertwining with that of her new neighbours, she finds herself torn between one who hates her and the other who obsesses over her. Despite being repulsed by their cruel intensity, Lily finds herself falling for two people who don't seem to be quite as human as they first appeared...
author: T. Kennedy
